content: bespoke doggie jumper our beloved pups come in all different shapes and sizes take some time to measure your dog and then use this fully customizable pattern to make a jumper perfectly tailored for your four-legged friend i have included a table with a description of all the measurements you need to make with space to fill in your pup s details i d recommend keeping your pup close and trying on the jumper as you make it the pattern is written in us crochet terminology if you have questions pleased get in touch via my instagram @crafter ele happy crafting paddy in red and grey and malcolm in purple and green showing off their bespoke doggie jumpers recommended materials this pattern is a guide so you can make a completely customized jumper it does not contain stitch counts as every dog is such a different shape that means you can use any yarn and hook combination and any stitch type although i recommend using a chunky yarn making half_double_crochet or double_crochet stitches you will need a hook suited to the yarn and a hook 2 sizes smaller for example i have made the jumper using chunky yarn the recommended hook size is 6 5 mm for this pattern i also used 5 5 mm abbreviations chain chain st s stitch es single_crochet single_crochet bl back loop fl front loop half_double_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet double_crochet skip skip st2tog stitch two measurements tips dog neck length measure from the top to the bottom 🄰 of the neck this will be the length of the collar piece neck circumference the collar is stretchy so measure 🄱 flat around the neck body circumference measure around the ribcage by 🄲 putting the tape measure behind the dog s front legs and over the back chest length measure the front of your dog s 🄳 chest from the bottom of the neck to the beginning of the legs chest width measure the space between your 🄴 dog s front legs back length 3 cm start at the bottom of the neck to the 🄵 base of the tail optional loosely measure loosely from the top of the 🄶 around leg for leg thigh at the back around the inside strap leg and to the top of the thigh at the front of the leg check the photos to see where the leg strap sits you
